narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: The Guidance Center is a Clinic/Center, Multi-Specialty provider based in Southgate, MI. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $91.2M in Medicaid payments across 746K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $91.2M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
